metadata.feature_description: Manage user activity data in Redux store with proper state updates

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify user activity details load and display correctly

steps.expected: Users list is displayed with action icons for each user
steps.actual: Users list displayed with User Activity icons visible for each user

steps.action: Clicked User Activity button for Test User12
steps.expected: User activity panel expands showing activity data (Redux state update triggered)
steps.actual: User Activity panel expanded showing: Last Active (moments ago), Rank (2), Reputation (15), Experience (20), Engagement (0), Influence (2), Total Contributions (0), Recent Activity (Joined Site 2 weeks ago - Evoq Content Library)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify state persistence during tab switches

steps.action: Clicked Account Settings tab for Test User12 while User Activity was open
steps.expected: Account Settings panel displays user account data (Redux state updates)
steps.actual: Account Settings panel displayed showing: User ID (16), Created Date, Last Login Date (February 28, 2026 9:42 AM), Last Activity Date (February 28, 2026 10:20 AM), Last Password Change (February 28, 2026 9:41 AM), and other account data

steps.action: Clicked User Activity tab to switch back from Account Settings
steps.expected: User Activity panel reloads and displays activity data correctly (Redux state management handles tab switch)
steps.actual: User Activity panel successfully displayed all activity data: Last Active (moments ago), Rank (2), Reputation (15), Experience (20), Engagement (0), Influence (2), Total Contributions (0), and Recent Activity section

observations: The Redux state management for user activity is implemented in the shared Users module (Dnn.AdminExperience\ClientSide\Users.Web). The user activity data (lastActivity, lastLogin, lastPasswordChange, etc.) is part of the userDetails state managed by the RETRIEVED_USER_DETAILS action type.

The specified files in the feature description (src/Modules/Evoq.PersonaBar.Users/EvoqUsers.Web/src/reducers/userActivity.js, src/Modules/Evoq.PersonaBar.Users/EvoqUsers.Web/src/actions/usersActivity.js) do not exist at that path. The actual implementation is in the Users.Web module under Dnn.AdminExperience\ClientSide.

User activity data displayed includes social metrics (Rank, Reputation, Experience, Engagement, Influence) in addition to traditional activity dates, suggesting integration with Evoq Engage social features.
